body.name: Logitech Brio 4K Webcam, Ultra 4K HD Video Calling, Noise-Canceling mic, HD Auto Light Correction, Wide Field of View, Works with Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Google Voice, PC/Mac/Laptop/MacBook/Tablet
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 16 hrs 33 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Ultra 4K HD resolution: 4 times the resolution of a typical HD webcam; look your best and enjoy professional video experience wherever you are with 5x HD zoom.
Auto light adjustment: Logitech RightLight 3 uses HDR technology to show you in the best light, even in low-light and backlit situations.
Noise-canceling technology: Dual omni-directional mics suppress background sound so you can be heard clearly.
3 field of view presets: Choose 90°, 78° or 65° dFOV via Logi Tune to include more of your environment or narrow the focus on you.
Up to 90 fps: Create high-quality video recording or streaming in any light condition.
Windows Hello integration: Easily and securely sign into your computer without a password.
Privacy shade: Flip up or and down to cover or expose the lens.
Works with Windows, Mac, or ChromeOS and popular calling and streaming platforms; 1 year limited hardware warranty.
body.description: Logitech Brio 4K Webcam supports enhanced video collaboration from any personal workspace at home or in the office. Ultra 4K HD renders video in outstanding resolution, color, and detail. RightLight 3 and High Dynamic Range (HDR) technologies auto-adjust to help you look your best in any lighting environment, from low light to direct sunlight. Integrated dual mics with noise-canceling technology that capture audio clearly from up to one meter away and make conversation natural and clear. The free Logi Tune desktop app simplifies webcam control, customization, firmware updates, and access to multiple diagonal-field-of-view presets to perfectly frame your video.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PROFESSIONAL VIDEO CALLS IN 4K The 4K Pro Webcam captures every detail in crisp, high-resolution color. With frame rates up to 90 fps, video is always remarkably smooth and fluid. Presentation sharing and video recording add to the versatility.

FRAME YOURSELF PERFECTLY Choose from three dFOV settings (65°, 78° or 90°) to perfectly frame your video. Zoom out to include more of your environment, or zoom in to focus more narrowly on yourself. ULTRA-SMOOTH RECORDING At 90 frames per second, 4K Pro Webcam delivers smooth and vivid video streaming. The higher frame rate is especially useful for slow-motion recording.

LOOK YOUR BEST IN ANY LIGHT Whether you’re in low light, direct sunlight, or high-contrast conditions, you can still look great on every video call, RightLight 3 technology automatically adjusts light balance. SOUND GREAT IN ANY ENVIRONMENT Integrated dual mics capture audio clearly from 1 meter away, making sure you sound and look great. Stay focused with advanced noise-canceling technology that suppresses distracting background sounds.

SECURITY MEETS CONVENIENCE Sign in securely and easily to your computer with Windows Hello facial recognition. PERSONALIZE YOUR VIDEO CALLS Customize 4K Pro Webcam with pan, zoom, and image controls with Logi Tune or G HUB for Windows or macOS. VERSATILE MOUNTING OPTIONS Securely mount webcam with the adjustable clip, or remove the clip and use your own tripod. Tripod not included. ATTACHABLE PRIVACY SHADE Flip the included lens cover to protect the lens and assure privacy when the webcam is not in use.

MX Keys An advanced wireless illuminated keyboard featuring Perfect Stroke keys shaped for your fingertips, smart illumination, and a remarkably solid build. LEARN MORE MX Master 3 Designed for designers and engineered for coders, MX Master 3 provides you with instant precision and infinite potential. With MX Master 3, you can truly master what you make. LEARN MORE H800 The H800 features an easily-adjustable microphone with USB nano receiver and Bluetooth connectivity options. So it's easy to connect and switch between devices. LEARN MORE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Webcam for Crystal-Clear Video Calls!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The Logitech Brio 4K Webcam is a true gem for anyone seeking an exceptional video calling experience. This webcam excels in every aspect, from video quality to advanced features.The 4K Ultra HD video calling capability is a game-changer. It brings unparalleled clarity and detail to video calls, ensuring you look your best and the backdrop is vivid and realistic.The noise-canceling microphone is a significant advantage. It eliminates background noise and ensures your voice comes through loud and clear, even in noisy environments.The HD auto light correction is a lifesaver. It adjusts to the lighting conditions automatically, making sure you’re well-lit and your image is sharp, no matter the time of day.The wide field of view captures more of your surroundings, which is perfect for business meetings or sharing your environment with friends and family.The Brio webcam is versatile and works seamlessly with popular platforms like Microsoft Teams, Zoom, and Google Voice. It’s compatible with various devices, from PCs and Macs to laptops, MacBooks, and tablets.If you’re looking for the ultimate webcam for video calls, the Logitech Brio 4K Webcam is a top choice. It offers unmatched video quality, audio clarity, and advanced features that enhance your video calling experience. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game changer for video calls and conferences
reviews.reviewText: This is a great camera and has great video quality! It feels much more professional to use this camera instead of the built-in one on my desktop. It has great quality and I'm able to adjust the brightness to whatever I need it to be. It's also nice that it can zoom in a fair bit, so I don't have to sit as close to my monitor. It has a cover as well, which is handy.It doesn't hold tight to the computer, but works fine if you don't move it around much. It comes with a small travel bag which is handy for hybrid work and always having a good quality camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Good. Vast Upgrade over built in laptop/apple device cameras. Not plastic
reviews.reviewText: After watching youtube reviews I was honestly surprised. Was surprised that this is made from metal, and has some weight to it. Its not a cheap plastic webcam. Video quality when you get it setup stands out as professional, and not "webcam quality" The video quality is very sharp. It looks more like DSLR, or Front Iphone camera than webcam. Low Light performance in poor lighting is excellent. When I turned on a video light it was phenomenal. Color balance is great. Saturation is just right, and not over saturated. Auto Focus just works. Auto white balance just works. I had a mix of light from 3 LCD Monitors, natural daylight coming through windows, warm ish ceiling lamp, and a cool video light. Noise Cancelling mic is excellent. I could hear myself clearly with a box fan running next to me. The wide field of view and quality of auto focus would make this ideal for recording a room such as a meeting, gathering, etc... The only drawbacks are that you really want to be using it with the built in logitech capture app. That takes an extra step of setup in apps like zoom. But its worth it because the video quality is way better if you use the logitech capture software as a source for zoom etc..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great video, hardware quality but the camera privacy system needs work
reviews.reviewText: The camera, as a video camera, is good. Video quality is better than my previous Razer camera and with Windows Hello support it makes system access a breeze. My only gripe with the camera? The privacy shutter is terrible. It comes off way to easy and is just not what I'd expect from Logitech.The privacy cover just clips on (poorly) to the top of the camera and has a little flap/door you swing down to cover the camera. Logitech, you really couldn't just add a privacy shutter and switch?Other than the privacy shutter my only other complaint is with the cord. It's too thick and stiff and makes it hard to position the camera without the cord forcing unwanted movement.Aside from those grips everything else about the camera, you know the camera/video stuff, is great. Logi's software is intuitive, video quality is top notch and runs without a hitch. I really like Windows Hello and that is supported on this camera with it's 3d face supplemental camera.All in all it's one of the top "streaming" cameras on the market with good reason, especially for Windows users with support for Windows Hello.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera has great video quality and the accompanying software gives lots of great options. Highly recommended buy!

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the best webcams on the market
reviews.reviewText: In the age of zoom, this webcam is one of the best available with crystal clear image quality at 4K. I've had it for a few years now and it is still the best webcam I've used. I also really like the windows hello integration which isn't available on most webcams.

reviews.reviewTitle: The Logitech Brio will put you in a good light. :-)
reviews.reviewText: The Logitech Brio will put you in a good light. :-)Like many, I work remotely and often video conference with clients. The Logitech Brio was a vast improvement over my built-in web camera. There was no lag in meetings, and the video was always smooth.The Logitech Brio has a friction clip that allows easy and secure attachment to my monitor. It looks good next to Miles, Elvis, Prince and Moz! :-) The setup was easy: I downloaded some software and plugged in a USB C cable.The Logitech Brio comes with a standard thread in the base for a tripod.Three adjustable fields of view to allow you to select from headshots to room views. Focus and lighting can be controlled automatically, and I’ve found no need to adjust the camera lighting manually. I use dedicated lighting when Zooming, and the Logitech Brio adjusts to that instantly.I use a dedicated boom mike and headset in a Zoom meeting, but I tested the Logitech Brio microphone, and clients had no trouble understanding me.The included software is intuitive and allows you to tweak your settings during a meeting. It’s also the portal to update firmware.There is also a security flap to block your camera when not in use. I’m probably paranoid, but I’ve trained to flip down the camera cover whenever I’m not using the webcam.In conclusion, the Logitech Brio is an affordable feature-packed camera that will improve the quality of Zoom meetings and other video-based communication. Once set up, it runs seamlessly in the background, showing you at your best.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente, solo 2 detalles... Ojalá mejoren en el futuro
reviews.reviewText: Uff, excelente producto, buenísima calidad de materiales, es pesada, lo que me asegura que tiene muchos componentes internos que soporta los vídeos y fotos en 4K, se siente la textura de buena calidad y materiales, realmente enfoca y lo hace rapidísimo, aunque tengas poca luz te ilumina con sus ajustes predeterminados bastante bien, sin distorsionarte ni pixelarte, realmente te sientes adentro de un vídeo en 4K, eso sí, no incluye software para ajustes, así que te recomiendo que entres a la página de Logic, y bajes los 2 software que son gratis, para que modifiques y optimices la cámara para que de el %100 del 4k, así como el zoom y otras cositas, porque la aplicación predeterminada de tu computadora no sirve para ajustarla. Lo único que me parece extraño y no me gustó... Fue que no se puede girar físicamente la cámara hacia la derecha ni la izquierda, tendrías que comprarte otra base que le embone y si se puede mover a los lados, porque únicamente te permite moverla de arriba hacia abajo, es lo único malo, ya que con la base que trae, tienes que mover la computadora si quieres que se vea tu perfil bueno, ya que actualmente la realidad es que nadie se enfoca de frente todo el tiempo, necesitamos movilidad, ojalá lo arreglen para futuras cámaras, otro pequeño detalle es que se calienta rápido, por eso recomiendo usarla en un ambiente con aire acondicionado, sin embargo sigue funcionando, no se apaga ni reinicia como hacen algunas camaras go pro, entre otras

Chegou bem antes do prazo e muito bem embalada. Ela não é uma câmera barata, mas vale cada centavo de investimento. Funciona muito bem em 4K, e a compatibilidade dela com Windows 11 não precisa nem de instalação de driver adicional. O cabo de conexão dela ao computador é reforçado e possui um organizador (o que achei muito prático). Vem uma bolsinha pra guardar ela que achei muito bonita e resistente. A instalação é simples, basta conectar ao computador. Se você ainda utiliza o Windows 10 ou versões anteriores do Windows, é recomendável a instalação do software adicional (Logitech Capture) e a configuração dele é bem intuitiva. O ajuste de iluminação ambiente dela facilita muito a utilização, principalmente naqueles dias que você não quer estar com "ring light" ligado e mesmo assim ter uma boa imagem capturada. Funcionou muito bem com Discord, Microsoft Teams, Zoom e OBS (que é meu uso principal). Bastante satisfeito com a compra, pois superou todas minhas expectativas. Recomendo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Die Bildqualität ist hervorragend und der Ton ist gut.
reviews.reviewText: Haptik und Funktionen sind perfekt. Kamera wird von Windows11 sofort erkannt. Mit LogiTune funktioniert sie einwandfrei. Eine andere Software habe ich dazu nicht nicht getestet. Die Bildqualität ist hervorragend und der Ton ist gut.
